casebody.data:
ABL PLUMBING AND HEATING CORPORATION
v.
BLADEN COUNTY BOARD OF EDUCATION, and Shuller Ferris Lindstrom & Associates. No. 35P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 2, 2006. Perry R. Safran, Brian J. Schoolman, Raleigh, for ABL Plumbing & Htg. Corp. Rod Malone, Kara Grice Acree, Raleigh, for Bladen County Bd. of Ed.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 23rd day of January 2006 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd day of March 2006."
